name: Fun In The Sun (itch)
description:
A cute little puzzle game originally written for Waterside Resort, Pran Buri.

Place guests next to trees so they can enjoy the shade, but make sure they are not next to each other so they can enjoy some quiet time.

Puzzle Rules

  1. There are just few simple rules to follow:
  2. A guest can only be next to a tree but not diagonal to a tree
  3. A guest can't be next to another guest, not even diagonally
  4. Guests must be placed to match the numbers in each column and row
  5. Each tree must be associated with one guest only, but can have more than one guest next to it

Features

  • Cute characters and music
  • Pleasant nature theme
  • Simple rules
  • Quick game play
  • No in game advertisements (Google Play version includes ads)

Upcoming Features

  • Achievements and Leaderboards
  • Multiple themes
  • New timer modes
  • Interactive tutorial
  • Hints
